GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
torture: Adjust to again produce debugging information

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit e887a99b380cce1bef800ee5bc32f45a5d2255df, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit f9b3cd24578401e7a392974b3353277286e49cee. For more details please see the references link.
